svg: A chart showing deforestation yearly in Brazil 300,000 1990; 500,000 2000; 660,000 2010; 700,000 2018 <line x1="1990" y1="300" stroke-width="3" stroke="yello" text-anchor="100,000s" <line x2="2000" y2="500" stroke-width="3" stroke="Green" text-anchor="100,000s" <line x3="2010" y3="660" stroke-width="3" stroke="yellow" text-anchor="100,000s" <line x4="2018" y4="700" stroke-width="3" stroke="Green" text-anchor="100,000s"
